formula: a(n) = (5*n)!/((3*n)!*(2*n)!).a(n) = 2F1[-3n,-2n,1,1] (see Mathematica code below). [_John M. Campbell_, Jul 15 2011]G.f.: hypergeom([1/5, 2/5, 3/5, 4/5], [1/3, 1/2, 2/3], (3125/108)*x). - _Robert Israel_, Aug 07 2014From _Peter Bala_, Oct 05 2015: (Start)a(n) = [x^n] ( (1 + x)*C(x) )^(5*n), where C(x) = (1 - sqrt(1 - 4*x))/(2*x) is the o.g.f. for the Catalan numbers A000108.a(n) = 5*A259550(n) for n >= 1.exp( 1/5 * Sum_{n >= 1} a(n)*x^n/n ) = 1 + 2*x + 23*x^2 + 377*x^3 + ... is the o.g.f. for the sequence of Duchon numbers A060941. (End)
mathematica: Table[Hypergeometric2F1[-3n,-2n,1,1],{n,0,60}] (* _John M. Campbell_, Jul 15 2011 *)Table[Binomial[5n,2n],{n,0,20}] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Nov 09 2011 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [Binomial(5*n, 2*n): n in [0..20]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 07 2014(PARI) a(n) = binomial(5*n,2*n) \\ _Altug Alkan_, Oct 06 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
